  • Constructor Details

    • Pan

      public Pan​(CardName name, boolean active, boolean opponent, boolean question, Status status, VirtualView vw)
      Card Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the card
      active - tell if the power is active
      opponent - OPPONENT'S TURN ABILITY FLAG, remove the respective cells to opponents
      question - tell if the god needs the Question Ability (Banner on GUI / Input and Print on CLI)
      status - tell in which state the God use his Ability
      vw - the Client's VirtualView

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(Cell from, Cell to)
      It adds a win condition: if the worker move down 2 the level he has automatically won
      Overrides:
      checkWin in class Card
      Parameters:
      from - cell
      to - cell
      Returns:
      true if this player win the match
